translations.translation: He is truly among Our faithful creatures.
Surely he was one of Our believing servants.
He was one of Our believing servants.
He is indeed one of Our high ranking, firmly believing bondmen.
Verily, he was one of Our believing servants.
Surely he was one of Our believing servants.
he was among Our believing servants.
Lo! he is one of Our believing slaves.
truly, he was one of Our faithful servants.
Verily he was one of Our believing bondmen.
He is indeed one of Our faithful servants.
For he was one of our believing Servants.
Verily, he was one of Our believing slaves.
He was one of Our believing worshipers.
He was one of Our believing servants.
Indeed, he was of Our believing servants.
[37:111] Indeed he is one of Our faithful servants.
(Lo! He) i.e. Abraham (is one of Our believing slaves) who are true in their faith.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: وكيف لا نجزي خليلنا؟! { إِنَّهُ مِنْ } خُلَّص { عِبَادِنَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ } [الصافات: 111] الموحدين الموقنين بذاتنا وصفاتنا وأفعالنا وأسمائنا، واستقلالنا في ملكنا وملكوتنا
